summary: Defines a diffusion pipeline that performs image inpainting by encoding an input image and mask into latent representations, conditioning a transformer model with CLIP and T5 text embeddings, and iteratively denoising latents using a scheduler to generate coherent content for the masked area.
business_intent: Enable developers and artists to automatically fill or modify selected regions of images based on natural language prompts, facilitating fast visual content creation, retouching, and creative workflows.
